TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ReceiveParametersContent extends System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveContent

Docs.summary: Enables a workflow service to receive data n the form of parameters.ReceiveParametersContent is interoperable with non-workflow WCF clients and services. The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent.Parameters%2A> collection is similar to the argument declaration on a C# method signature.The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveParametersContent.Parameters%2A> collection cannot contain arguments marked with <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageContractAttribute>, or of type <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message>. Please use for these types of data.This is a sealed class.
